channel.title: Safe Zones

item.title: Safe Zones
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

public boolean nonWild() {
if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) || (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112)
return true;
else if
return false;
}

try that

[code]client.java:1452: illegal start of expression

2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) ||

2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) ||

2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) ||

else if

4 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2007, 02:11:46 PM[/size][hr]Then deleted the if before the 2nd set of coords and got these errors:

client.java:1452: illegal start of expression if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) || (absY >= 27 52 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) || ^ client.java:1456: illegal start of type else if ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Safe Zones
item.dc:creator: @newton37 newton37
item.description:
@newton37 wrote:

How do I add safe zones, this is what I’ve tried:

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) || if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) heightLevel = 0) return true; else if return false; }

but that gave me errors, before it was:

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) return true; else if return false; }
please help

Read full topic
